code: export var PrintPlayerInMap=function PrintPlayerInMap(player,map){var newMap=map.map(function(arr){return arr.slice();});for(var y=0;y<player.bloco.bloco.length;y++){for(var x=0;x<player.bloco.bloco.length;x++){if(player.bloco.bloco[y][x]===1){var pixelY=player.pos[0]+y;var pixelX=player.pos[1]+x;newMap[pixelY][pixelX]={fill:1,color:player.bloco.color};}}}return newMap;};
